title: Ralph Guerra (Comedian! Car journalist!)
description:
Ralph Guerra is a standup comedian and automotive journalist. We talk about cars we've driven, where you can buy a monster truck, and lots more!

Find his tour dates at https://ralphguerracomedy.com/

IG: @saveralphguerra

Follow us! T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

NEW SHIRTS! https://www.blipshift.com/tst

 

WATCH the show! https://youtu.be/W8dMqKT_534
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
